name: Heroines of Swords & Spells + Green Furies DLC
name_original: Heroines of Swords & Spells + Green Furies DLC
description:
Heroines of Swords & Spells + Green Furies DLC contains both the base game and Green Furies DLC content


Prepare to embark on an epic and humorous adventure in the fantasy world of Heroines of Swords & Spells! Guide a group of four wayward heroines through the perils of this intricate and detailed world as they strive to prove their worth to themselves and others. This is not your typical JRPG with chosen heroes and isekai protagonists; it is about companionship, struggles, and witty banter!

With more than 150,000 lines of dialogue and 20 hours of gameplay, Heroines of Swords & Spells is not just a game but a book that will appeal to old-school RPG fans. You will love this game if you enjoy exploring detailed worlds and reading humorous fantasy. Interact with NPCs and explore the world to uncover its rich lore, but be prepared for challenging battles. You must think strategically, from countless enemies to dungeons full of ambushes and traps, to come out on top.

Lead a team consisting of a naive thief, a hyperactive mage, a cowardly warrior, and a beautiful but somewhat weak priest. With a suspenseful and humorous plot, a battle system that eliminates the need for equipment farming and random encounters, and intricate non-linear quest systems, Heroines of Swords & Spells offers hours of immersive gameplay. Discover a multitude of Easter eggs and tributes to classic games of old as you journey through this fantastic world.
If you're up for the challenge, prepare to lead the dream team to victory with the help of the merciful Svetodar. Good luck on your journey!

Featuring:
  • Turn-based combat system for challenging battles.
  • A rich and intricate world with secrets and dungeons.
  • Hilarious and suspenseful plot with 150k+ lines of dialogue.
  • A dream team of quirky heroines with unique abilities.
  • Old-school RPG appeal with non-linear quests and over 20 hours of gameplay.


In Heroines of Swords & Spells: Green Furies you join 4 goblinettes on their quest for riches by stealing from a fearsome monster. Enjoy 7 hours of gameplay with new quests, bosses & equipment. Explore a small goblin cave with 4 unique playable characters.

Featuring:
  • 4 new playable antihero characters.
  • Unique story with engaging side quests.
  • Explore a small but intricate goblin cave.
  • Battle against challenging bosses for valuable equipment.
  • 7 hours of gameplay with hilarious dialogue and an intriguing plot.
